casebody.data:
Kapil GOEL, Appellant-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent-Respondent. C-239 September Term 2017
079809 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 26, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001532-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
